actions.message:
Welcome to the reaction based help command.
Here you can see various commands accessible to the Server as well
as various other bits of information that you may need.
React â© to continue
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
!Fun -- All fun commands.
!Moderation -- All moderation commands.
!Support -- All support commands.

actions.title: Fun Commands
actions.description: Insult, Trash, Meme, 8ball, Cat, Dog, Weather, Coinflip
actions.name: Edit Embed Object MOD

actions.title: Moderation Commands
actions.description: Kick, Ban, Unban, Mute, Unmute, Purge
actions.name: Edit Embed Object MOD

actions.message:
You forgot to say the announcement.
!announce <message>
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
**!unsult <@user>** -> Insults the taged user.
**!trash <@user>** -> Trash the tagged user.
**!8ball <question>** -> Magic 8ball answers the question.
**!weather <location>** -> Tells the weather of the location.
**!coinflip** -> Randomly flips a coin.
**!meme** -> Sends a random fresh meme.
**!cat** -> Sends a random picture of a cat.
**!dog** -> Sends a random picture of a dog.
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
You forgot to mention who to insult.
!insult <@user>
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
For forgot to mention the user.
!trash <@user>
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
You forgot to ask a question...
!8ball <Ask a question>
actions.name: Set Embed Description
Set Embed Description

actions.message:
**!kick <@user>** -> Kicks the tagged user from the server.
**!ban <@user>** -> Bans the tagged user from the server.
**!unban <@userid>** -> Unbans the tagged user from the server.
**!mute <@user>** -> Mutes the tagged user.
**!unmute <@user>** -> Unmutes the tagged user.
**!purge <ammount>** -> Deletes amount of messages.
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message: This is the message that the reaction will attach too.
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message: Please don't post Server Invites in the Server. Thank you for your cooperation.
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
Please mention one user in order to kick them!
!kick [@user] [Reason]
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
Please mention one user in order to ban them!
!ban [@user] [Reason]
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
Please mention one user in order to unban them!
!unban [@user]
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
${mentionedUser} was unbanned from the server. They may now 
join back.
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
Please mention one user in order to mute them!
!mute [@user]
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
Please mention one user in order to unmute them!
!mute [@user]
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message: How many winners would you like to have?

actions.message:
How long do you want the giveaway to last in days/hours/minutes?

Ex. I want the giveaway to last 1 day so I would respond with
1d
actions.name: Edit Message
Run Script
Run Script

actions.message:
What channel would you like this giveaway to be posted in?

Please respond by mentioning a channel
#[channelname]

Ex. My channel name I want the giveaway to be hosted in is giveaways
I would respond with
#giveaways
actions.name: Edit Message
Run Script

actions.message:
The command has timeout as you either took too long or too many people has chatted while you are trying to setup the giveaway

Please try again, in an less active channel so you can see the original message that gives you instructions on how to setup the giveaway
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
!ticket <reason> -> Opens a ticket for support.
!clostticket <ticket channel name> -> Closes the ticket.
actions.name: Set Embed Description
